job_details.degree_required: Bachelor’s Degree in Information Systems, Computer Science, Business Analysis, or related field

jd: From: Payal Shrivastava, Tek Inspirations LLC payal.shrivastava@tekinspirations.com Reply to: payal.shrivastava@tekinspirations.com Title : Business Analyst/Tester Duration: 6 Months Location: HYBRID. Harrisburg, PA ( Candidates MUST be able to report onsite 2 days/week in Harrisburg, Pa ) Business Analyst/Tester Support hands-on test case writing and test execution. Identify and create UAT test cases. Execute UAT test cases, including developing and reporting defects, and retesting. Collaborate with the Lottery PMO and SMEs to document UAT test cases and identify regression test cases for future automation. Qualifications Bachelor’s Degree in Information Systems, Computer Science, Business Analysis, or related field. Minimum of 3-5 years of combined experience in business analysis and software testing. Minimum of 1-2 years of JIRA experience Experience with UAT test case creation and execution. Strong understanding of test management tools. Excellent attention to detail and problem-solving skills. Regards, Payal Shrivastava IT Recruiter TEK Inspirations LLC : 13573 Tabasco Cat Trail, Frisco, TX 75035 Email: payal.shrivastava@tekinspirations.com
